divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were out side with the video camera because I got a hunch that something was going to happen. I know this may sound cheeze, but I was taping UFO Hunters, when about 9:45 pm the DVD recorder shut off and we were watching a blue screen. I decided to grab the camera and run outside. I had the night vision on and just as soon as I panned the camera to the top of my house a bright streak shot across the feild of view. It seemed very close as it was quite large on the view finder. I transfered the tape to DVD and took a still shot of the TV set with my photo camera. The event took only one second but when I steped the DVD through the still frame it looks like the object just appears at almost the top of the screen then streaks to the bottom instantaineously this was fast. I have the tape but I'm just going to post the jpg. This may be nothing but if it were a meteor it would seem that the photo would show a long tail. This looks a lot like a cigar shaped light.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in McKinney
There were no other sightings in McKinney on or around April 2nd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Vidieo of misting gray night , cigar shaped light streaked across camera
